timeline.message:
GEODE-8242: Add HSTRLEN redis command

- Also define PUBSUB as an unimplemented command

Authored-by: Jens Deppe <jdeppe@vmware.com>

timeline.bodyText: do a hstrlen on some other existing type (like a string or set) and confirm you get the expected error
timeline.author: dschneider-pivotal

replies.bodyText: do we have a way of testing the wrong number of arguments to a command? Will any of our redis clients even let that happen?
replies.author: dschneider-pivotal

replies.bodyText: We can do something like jedis.sendCommand(Command.STRLEN, "foo", "bar", ...) but we don't have explicit tests for command input lengths. They are tested implicitly through the parameter requirements defined against each command in RedisCommandType.
replies.author: jdeppe-pivotal
